plot: John Oliver discusses the history and potential of psychedelic assisted therapy; plus, the Fox News lawsuit; the Ohio train derailment.

Coming back from the break, John Oliver explains the long trend of fear-mongering about the psychedelic treatments. He discusses about psychedelic assisted therapy and its history, how it got here, its potentials, and future possibilities. But it will require cautious monitoring to reap the benefits psychedelic treatments without someone getting hurt.—Niaz Islam Arif
